1.5.9.name: wordpress/comments-statistics
1.5.9.description:
This plugin shows the total number of articles and comments as well as statistics about which platforms and browsers were used in comment writing. It uses icons to identify both platforms and browsers. You can see a screenshot of it at "Screenshots". Worry not, the plugin is written in English :)

This plugin was originally created by Mario Gamito (R.I.P). I think he deserves someone to maintain it.
